@getnickwright if dak was in his 5th year aside from the win record his numbers aren't MVP calibre. That he a 4th Rd rookie is the reason

@joerogan listening to you and @redban talk no mans sky. It actually has 18 quintillion planets and the universe is persistent for everyone.
@redban meta critic aggregates the actual score RT aggregates whether the review was positive or negative.
@redban also publications don't have one reviewer that reviews every movie
@redban it's an aggregate of whether the review given was positive or negative not an aggregate of the actual score 68%+ is positive
@redban if a movie on rotten tomatoes gets a 68% or above from a reviewer it's considered positive. So if 70/72 gave a c+ it would have 98%
@redban Brian you just have no idea how rotten tomatoes works: Google how does rotten tomatoes work.

@joerogan snowden has no access and hasn't had access to those documents since he was in Hong Kong. Before anyone even knew he was gone.
@joerogan Mike baker thinking the Russians and Chinese got ahold of snowden documents just shows again how little he knows about encryption
@joerogan watch citizenfour on hbo if you actually want to learn about snowden.
@joerogan assuming Mike Baker knows anything about what was going on at the NSA is pretty naive almost no one in govt knew until snowden
@joerogan Iphone 7 will not allow apple to sideload updates. Meaning they will not be able to comply with any govt requests anyways.
@joerogan there s no such thing as a back door for the good guys. A back door is a vulnerability anyone can exploit
@joerogan apple can't access the personal contents of anyone's phone once it's encrypted. And creating back door renders encryption useless
@joerogan or wasn't even that I agreed or disagreed with mike baker. He just didn't have any clue about encryption on even a basic level
@joerogan Edward snowden revelations aren't irrelevant apple only recently started encrypting their phones. before nsa could take anything
@joerogan had to turn off Mike baker when apple talk started. Such an uninformed conversation. Not your fault you would he knew something
